subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/question-answer-MJ.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : This one says "love me Jim" at the end. In between were I talk at beginning....I hear someone-but I haven't taken time to really find what he is saying. This recording is of course directed to Michael Jackson from Prospect Park on June 28th 2009 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/question-answer-MJ.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
